records.day_id: CASE WHEN ares.RESOURCE_AMOUNT_TYPE_ID = 1 THEN (EXTRACT(year FROM (ac.entry_date AT TIME ZONE '${TIMEZONE}')::timestamp) * 100000 + EXTRACT(doy FROM (ac.entry_date AT TIME ZONE '${TIMEZONE}')::timestamp)) ELSE (EXTRACT(year FROM (ac.date_resolved AT TIME ZONE '${TIMEZONE}')::timestamp) * 100000 + EXTRACT(doy FROM (ac.date_resolved AT TIME ZONE '${TIMEZONE}')::timestamp)) END
records.pi_xras_person_id: (SELECT COALESCE(rpr.person_id, -1) AS "pi_xras_person_id" FROM "xras"."request_people_roles" AS rpr LEFT JOIN "xras"."request_role_types" AS rrt ON rrt.request_role_type_id = rpr.request_role_type_id LEFT JOIN "xras"."people" AS p ON p.person_id = rpr.person_id WHERE rrt.request_role_type = 'PI' AND COALESCE(rpr.end_date, '9999-01-01') >= r.entry_date AND rpr.request_id = r.request_id ORDER BY COALESCE(rpr.end_date, '9999-01-01') ASC LIMIT 1)
records.pi_xras_organization_id: (SELECT COALESCE(p.organization_id, -1) AS "pi_xras_organization_id" FROM "xras"."request_people_roles" AS rpr LEFT JOIN "xras"."request_role_types" AS rrt ON rrt.request_role_type_id = rpr.request_role_type_id LEFT JOIN "xras"."people" AS p ON p.person_id = rpr.person_id WHERE rrt.request_role_type = 'PI' AND COALESCE(rpr.end_date, '9999-01-01') >= r.entry_date AND rpr.request_id = r.request_id ORDER BY COALESCE(rpr.end_date, '9999-01-01') ASC LIMIT 1)
records.action_day_id: EXTRACT(year FROM (ac.entry_date AT TIME ZONE '${TIMEZONE}')::timestamp) * 100000 + EXTRACT(doy FROM (ac.entry_date AT TIME ZONE '${TIMEZONE}')::timestamp)
records.action_resolve_day_id: EXTRACT(year FROM (ac.date_resolved AT TIME ZONE '${TIMEZONE}')::timestamp) * 100000 + EXTRACT(doy FROM (ac.date_resolved AT TIME ZONE '${TIMEZONE}')::timestamp)
records.requested: CASE WHEN ares.RESOURCE_AMOUNT_TYPE_ID = 1 THEN ares.RESOURCE_AMOUNT ELSE null END
records.recommended: CASE WHEN ares.RESOURCE_AMOUNT_TYPE_ID = 3 THEN ares.RESOURCE_AMOUNT ELSE null END
records.awarded: CASE WHEN ares.RESOURCE_AMOUNT_TYPE_ID = 2 THEN ares.RESOURCE_AMOUNT ELSE null END
